trans-unit.source: Content is being generated, this may take a moment...
Speed up your daily work and get better results from AI by preparing your pages or page trees.
Do very special stuff like translating a XLF file.
With the help of AI, you can have a page tree created. This is created with the pages you want.
Generate page tree with content as you like.
Advanced page tree creation: Workflow to create a page tree with page metadata and content inside the new pages.
Translate an extensions XLF language file in a choosen language. Remember that there has to be a destination directory for the translation.
Translate a complete page with page properties and content inside.
Translate a single content element. Remember that there has to be a mapping file for custom content elements.
Translate a single file, e.g. alt and title attributes of a image file.
Create a single image or a set of images for using it as content anywhere.
The AI Suite provides prompt templates. You can also add your own custom prompt templates. This action only updates the server prompt templates. Your custom prompt templates remain untouched.
Speed up your daily work and get better results from AI by preparing your prompts efficiently.
Create me a page structure for [...].
Paste the new structure under the following page:
This module works on the active page, which is selected in the page tree on the left.
Validate your AI result before adding this to your page.
The image prompt. You can refactor the image prompt and reorder a for a new image.
Create new files or file metadata
Support for agencies for the daily work
Validate translations before writing to the file system
Translate the whole file, overwrite existing translations
Work on pages and page tree

Please check your AI Suite extension settings and make sure that you have inserted a correct page ID within the "Metadata" tab for fetching the news record.
Content of news article could not be fetched. If you create a new one please save your changes first and try generation again.

You can switch between Midjourney versions. Different versions excel at producing different types of images.
Changes the aspect ratio of the generated image. An aspect ratio is the width-to-height ratio of an image.
Tell Midjourney what not to include in your image. Accepts multiple words separated with commas.
Enter web address (URL) where the image is stored. You can use images as style references in your prompt to influence the style or aesthetic of images you want Midjourney to make.
Please run database update (Credits table is missing)
A maximum of two images will be created in the course of the first request. Additional images can then be added at any time.

Store image and media files at this folder (e.g. /images/ai-images/subfolder). If the folder doesn't exist, it will be created.
Open translated record in edit mode
AI Plugin in CKEditor / RTE fields
If active the AI Plugin will be shown within CKEditor / RTE fields.
AI translation options within translation wizard
If active AI translation options will be added within the translation wizard
If active buttons with title "Generate image with AI" will be added to file fields within content elements and within filelist module
An additional "AI Suite Content" tab will be added to NewContentElementWizard
Button "News with AI" (only evaluated if EXT:news is active)
If active a button with title "News with AI" will be added to the list module header bar (only evaluated if EXT:news is active)
Enable pages section within backend module
If active the "Pages" button will be shown within the backend module
If active the metadata generation buttons will be shown next to the corresponding fields
